entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of thunderstorms this afternoon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of thunderstorms. Snow level 1000 metres. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
